storyInfo: Catastrophe and the Rathalos throw the village into chaos. Hiroshi Ritou tries to turn the villagers against the headman, but Yato's group returns to Roka in time to calm things down and evacuate the villagers.

attributes.content: Hurry it up, everyone!
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Masked Villager

attributes.content: You should run too, Ritou! Money isn't as important as your life.
attributes.name: Masked Villager

attributes.content: Shut up!
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: I'll delay the old man!
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: What are you standing around for?
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Can I take it you've given up on treating your sister?
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: But... Alright.
attributes.name: Masked Villager

attributes.content: Kusso...
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: *Sobbing*...
attributes.name: Lost Child

attributes.content: Mom? Where are you?
attributes.name: Lost Child

attributes.content: Where are you...
attributes.name: Lost Child

attributes.content: Mom... don't leave me here...
attributes.name: Lost Child

attributes.content: (Flurry Rush!)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: In the nick of time!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Is the child okay?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Let me see. All four limbs attached, no external wounds... does it hurt anywhere?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Ouch... your armor's spiky...
attributes.name: Lost Child

attributes.content: Oops, sorry.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: My child!
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: Mom!
attributes.name: Lost Child

attributes.content: Thank you... Thank you so much for saving my child!
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: Stay away from the forest. There are wild beasts in the area, and they're increasing in numbers. It's not safe here.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato... I don't think they came out here because they wanted to.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: No! There's netting between the village and the forest. I reinforced it myself not long ago. How could there be beasts here?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I need to go take a look.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Calm down. Has the evacuation started?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: No... There's no evacuation. The mine exploded, the sky started burning... there's nothing left.
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: Everyone's running. We all panicked when we heard that beasts were coming, but we don't know where to go.
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: Why is it so chaotic? What happened?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: I tried to pull Naoki away from the crowd, but then a bunch of them ran straight at us. Naoki was gone by the time I caught my breath.
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: Someone intentionally damaged the netting, letting in the beasts.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: Ano yarou... Where is Takii?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: The headman is—
attributes.name: Frenetic Villager

attributes.content: Here they come again, Corne!
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'll hold them off with my shield... Argh, whatever, a sword's fine!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Kashiwau, please take these two to a safe place and see if you can help out in the village. Corne and I will stop the beasts.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I don't need you to tell me that. Let's go Mirai... Mirai?
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I think she already went in.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: How could it have come so quickly? Wasn't it supposed to take more time for the Catastrophe to form?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Noshige, Inoue, get everybody together and take them to the shelter I told you about! It's safer there. We'll evacuate as a group once we have everybody!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Good thing we'd prepared for this day... What you said came true again.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: It's burning...
attributes.name: Despondent Villager

attributes.content: The mountains are covered in smoke... the sky's on fire... the mine's gone...
attributes.name: Despondent Villager

attributes.content: What are you doing? Grab your things and get out of here!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: My livelihood, my life, it's all gone...
attributes.name: Despondent Villager

attributes.content: Headman... will we have to go back to our old life, now that the mine's all burned up?
attributes.name: Despondent Villager

attributes.content: Now's not the time for that!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Gone... everything's gone...
attributes.name: Despondent Villager

attributes.content: Why are you panicking like that? The Catastrophe isn't even here yet.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Beasts! The beasts are coming!
attributes.name: Panicking Villager

attributes.content: Beasts! And so close! What happened to the protective netting?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Ritou, get over here! What's going on over there?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Headman! The netting on the west side is broken! The beasts are in the village! What do we do?
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: What in blazes is going on here?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Everybody, calm down! Take the bare minimum of what you need, gather at the shelter in the northeast, and wait for evacuation! The beasts can't get in there.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Headman... why is there a shelter in the village?
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Did you already know this was going to happen?
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: This... happened because you closed the mine, didn't it?
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: H-Headman?
attributes.name: Panicking Villager

attributes.content: Headman!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: What you on about, Ritou? You know that isn't true!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: This is no time to be fooling around! Lives are at stake here!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Don't just stand there, folks! Head to the shelter!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: No, this is important! Everything we've worked for is gone! We need justice!
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Why did the mine have to be closed? Why did this disaster happen right afterward?
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Y-Yeah! You closed it for 5 days out of the blue for a 'maintenance check,' and now the mine's gone, and the whole mountain is burning!
attributes.name: Panicking Villager

attributes.content: Did you close the mine and keep the truth hidden from the others because of that monster that showed up down there? Is that the cause of this disaster?
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: We could have worked together to deal with it!
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: It was your idea to keep it a secret, to prevent a panic.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: And don't think I don't know about your little side business. I know how much you've pocketed ever since your family started handling the transactions.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: If you have the slightest bit of conscience left, stop delaying the evacuation!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Then how do you explain the shelter? You must have planned this in advance... You're the one who wants to hoard the wealth of the mine all to yourself!
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: You even blew up the cave... You killed those two doctors who came to investigate the Oripathy!
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Headman...
attributes.name: Inoue

attributes.content: What did you do, Headman?
attributes.name: Noshige

attributes.content: Not you too... Ritou...
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Yes, I'll admit I've wanted to close the mine for a long time. I knew that overexploitation of the mine was bound to bring disaster. The shelter was built in preparation for this day.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Why? Because we're over-reliant on Originium mining. Originium particles have already entered the environment. The danger has been slowly building for a while now!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: It was only a matter of time before Catastrophe struck and we'd have to abandon the mine, but I couldn't get everyone to give up on it before. We all benefitted too much from the Originium trade.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: That day simply came a little sooner than expected, that's all.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: And yes, I closed the mine because of that unknown creature.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: You all know that I used to be a hunter. I judged that it wasn't something we could easily handle, and we couldn't afford to fight it in the tunnels.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Ishidori and the others have already been infected with Oripathy. People would have died if we'd continued to dig. The responsibility for all of your lives falls on my shoulders.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: ...Which is the same reason I'm telling you to evacuate now.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Mine or not, the most important thing is that we're alive.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: But then things would go back to how they used to be...
attributes.name: Sad Villager

attributes.content: Cold nights... howling in the forest... blood, cold, hunger... fear... no! I don't want to go back to that!
attributes.name: Sad Villager

attributes.content: So what if we're alive?! Where's the hope? I'd rather die than go back to living like that!
attributes.name: Sad Villager

attributes.content: What are you saying... get ahold of yourself!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: He's right! We won't go back!
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: It was you who got us started on mining Originium in the first place! It's all your fault!
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: You ruined everything!
attributes.name: Sad Villager

attributes.content: You've ruined the village! Ruined all our lives!
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: This man must be made to pay! We all agree, don't we?
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Enough of this!
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: There's a Catastrophe right on your doorstep!
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Haven't we already paid enough of a price? Are we going to lose even more lives just for this meaningless venting?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Mirai! Why are you back?
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Oh look, another troublemaker. The apple doesn't fall far from the tree.
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: The frightened beasts are heading down the mountain, the netting's been sabotaged, and someone's trying to stir up chaos...
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: All to force us to wait for death in despair, and abandon the hope we could have had.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Sad Villager

attributes.content: And we still can have, away from the Originium mines, without having to rely on hunting either.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: That's why I came back from the city.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Liar! You were the one who wanted to close the mine and ruin our lives!
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Yes, because Originium is dangerous and hard to control. I even considered blowing up the mine.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: But I also understand that we owe our livelihood to it.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Do you remember back when we were trying to climb out of poverty? Were we in despair then?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Was it really the Originium that got us to where we are today?
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: We seized our chance to escape poverty because we had the determination to look for a way, and the courage to expose ourselves to Originium.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Y... Yeah.
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Since ancient times, hunters have made a living by fighting beasts, back when there was no Originium. Many of them died, but we survived as a people.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Courage and hope come hand-in-hand. And we've never abandoned our courage...
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: So hope will always appear by our side.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Don't listen to her! She was the one who wanted to close the mine! And now she's destroyed the mine, she practically admitted it!
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: But Mirai only tried to convince us to close it because overexploitation would cause a Catastrophe. And now that really happened...
attributes.name: Stout Villager

attributes.content: We were wrong to doubt her...
attributes.name: Tall Villager

attributes.content: You're familiar with the plant in this flask, aren't you? Among the goods that we trade with the outside, the Suzuka herb is second only to Originium in terms of trade volume.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: It only grows in certain areas, and in small numbers. We've had to risk life and limb to harvest it.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: But I came back to study the possibility of cultivating it, and planting it outside its native habitat. This one I'm holding right here is my greatest breakthrough.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: It can survive outside of these mountains. It's the first brick that will lay the foundation of our future as a village.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: But first, we need to survive.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: Survive...
attributes.name: Sad Villager

attributes.content: Yeah, what were we thinking? We fought so hard to get to this point. We can't just die here.
attributes.name: No Longer Angry Villager

attributes.content: No! We'll lose all our income without the mine—
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Aah!
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Who... gah...
attributes.name: Hiroshi Ritou

attributes.content: Open your mouth again, and I'm sticking your head in the mud.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: This entire conversation is a waste of time.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: This man damaged the netting, tried to lure in beasts to cause chaos, then distracted everyone from what was going on.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: While on the other side of the village, he had some people moving his assets out, something he clearly planned ahead of time. I've already taken care of them.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You will now head to the shelter in an orderly line and await evacuation. Reinforcements from Rhodes Island will be arriving soon.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Now, you can walk there yourselves, or I can knock you out and have someone else carry you. Choose.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Er... thank you.
attributes.name: Mirai Takii

attributes.content: There's a beast outbreak, and they're approaching the village. That's the biggest threat we're facing right now.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: We'll handle the beasts. I can't guarantee we'll get all of them, but we'll do what we can to ensure your safety.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: No, please stay here and protect the evacuating villagers. You're the only ones who can.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: And take care of Mirai for me.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Headman! Where are you going?
attributes.name: No Longer Angry Villager

attributes.content: I'm the headman of Roka Village, and the leader of its hunters.
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: The beasts have emerged from their forests, so I'll fight them to my last breath, even if I'm on my own!
attributes.name: Ataru Takii

attributes.content: Honey, take Tsuyumaru to the shelter.
attributes.name: No Longer Angry Villager

attributes.content: I think I left my machete in the backyard?
attributes.name: No Longer Angry Villager

attributes.content: Yes, it's there... come back safely!
attributes.name: Sad Villager

attributes.content: The headman's always treated our family well. It's high time we repaid him!
attributes.name: Stout Villager

attributes.content: Yes, we're with him, whether it's in the mines or in the forests. We've always been hunters. Take up your spears!
attributes.name: Tall Villager

attributes.content: We'll protect our own village and our own families!
attributes.name: Tall Villager

attributes.content: Headman! Wait for us!
attributes.name: Stout Villager

attributes.content: I'm going too!
attributes.name: Bald Villager

attributes.content: Mom, didn't dad said there were no hunters anymore?
attributes.name: Frightened Child

attributes.content: No, Sumiko. The hunters have always been here, ready to step forward whenever danger approaches.
attributes.name: Resolute Villager

attributes.content: Hmph... and now they're putting on a show. They're no hunters.
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau

attributes.content: I'm the only one...
attributes.name: Yoshitaka Kashiwau
